body:
Finally slogged through fixing my postgresql installation issue:

```
Warning: postgresql-9.6.2 already installed, it's just not linked.
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ brew link postgresql
Linking /usr/local/Cellar/postgresql/9.6.2... 
Error: Could not symlink share/man/man3/SPI_connect.3
/usr/local/share/man/man3 is not writable.
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ chown -R sdonner:20 /usr/local/share/man/man3
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::I18N.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Editor.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Fetcher.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Memoize::YAML.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Prompt.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Ra.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Utils.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3: Operation not permitted
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ sudo chown -R sdonner:20 /usr/local/share/man/man3
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ brew install postgresql
Warning: postgresql-9.6.2 already installed, it's just not linked.
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ brew link postgresql
Linking /usr/local/Cellar/postgresql/9.6.2... 
Error: Could not symlink share/man/man7/ABORT.7
/usr/local/share/man/man7 is not writable.
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ sudo chown -R sdonner:20 /usr/local/share/man/man7
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ brew link postgresql
Linking /usr/local/Cellar/postgresql/9.6.2... 375 symlinks created
```
body_text:
Finally slogged through fixing my postgresql installation issue:
Warning: postgresql-9.6.2 already installed, it's just not linked.
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ brew link postgresql
Linking /usr/local/Cellar/postgresql/9.6.2... 
Error: Could not symlink share/man/man3/SPI_connect.3
/usr/local/share/man/man3 is not writable.
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ chown -R sdonner:20 /usr/local/share/man/man3
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::I18N.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Editor.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Fetcher.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Memoize::YAML.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Prompt.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Ra.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Utils.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3: Operation not permitted
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ sudo chown -R sdonner:20 /usr/local/share/man/man3
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ brew install postgresql
Warning: postgresql-9.6.2 already installed, it's just not linked.
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ brew link postgresql
Linking /usr/local/Cellar/postgresql/9.6.2... 
Error: Could not symlink share/man/man7/ABORT.7
/usr/local/share/man/man7 is not writable.
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ sudo chown -R sdonner:20 /usr/local/share/man/man7
sdonner-17447:~ sdonner$ brew link postgresql
Linking /usr/local/Cellar/postgresql/9.6.2... 375 symlinks created

Warning: postgresql-9.6.2 already installed, it's just not linked.

/usr/local/share/man/man3 is not writable.

chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::I18N.3pm: Operation not permitted
chown: /usr/local/share/man/man3/Git::SVN::Editor.3pm: Operation not permitted
